dataset:
geo_ftp geo_raw_mirror /home/larsab/troilkatt/mas5/pcl_lists/mouse_pcl_test.txt geo/raw/mouse none -1 Download RAW files from the GEO FTP server that match the specified organism.
remove_overlapping sge_stage execute_per_file 8 6000 java -Xmx4096m -classpath TROILKATT.CLASSPATH edu.princeton.function.troilkatt.mongodb.SGERawRemoveOverlapping TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR TROILKATT.TMP_DIR 10.1.1.1 imp/raw/mouse/rmo none -1 Remove overlapping samples and split RAW file into platform specific parts.
cel2pcl sge_stage script_per_file 8 6000 /usr/bin/python TROILKATT.SCRIPTS/cel2pcl.py TROILKATT.BIN/R TROILKATT.SCRIPTS/R/ProcessCEL_MAS.R Mm imp/raw/mouse/pcl bz2 -1 Convert cel files to PCL format.
missing_values sge_stage execute_per_file 16 4096 java -Xmx2048m -classpath TROILKATT.CLASSPATH edu.princeton.function.troilkatt.mongodb.SGEPclMissingValues TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.map 50 3 50 10.1.1.1 > TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.out 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.err imp/raw/mouse/mv bz2 14 Fill in missing values and set some values that are better characterized as missing.
knnimpute mapreduce_stage execute_per_file TROILKATT.BIN/KNNImputer -i TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE -o TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.knn -k 10 -m 0.7 -d euclidean > TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/KNNImputer.out 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/KNNImputer.error imp/raw/mouse/knn bz2 14 Fill in missing values with their most likely values.
map_genes mapreduce TROILKATT.JAR edu.princeton.function.troilkatt.mapreduce.BatchPclMapGeneNames TROILKATT.GLOBALMETA_DIR/genes/imp/mmu.map imp/raw/mouse/map bz2 14 Translate all gene names to a common standard
average_duplicates mapreduce TROILKATT.JAR edu.princeton.function.troilkatt.mapreduce.BatchPclMeanGenesThatAgree 0 imp/raw/mouse/avg bz2 14 Average together duplicate genes
pcl2qdab mapreduce_stage execute_per_file /usr/bin/python TROILKATT.SCRIPTS/pcl2qdab.py TROILKATT.BIN TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE TROILKATT.TMP_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE_NOEXT.dat TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE_NOEXT.qdab TROILKATT.GLOBALMETA_DIR/imp/GSE.quant > TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.output 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.error imp/raw/mouse/qdab bz2 -1 Do distance calculation and convert .dat files to .dab files
-->
imp_mouse_raw_pcl_sink null_sink
There is no sink for the final qdab files.
